boardgame.name: Bienvenido de Nuevo a la Mazmorra
Üdvözlet újra a Mélyben
Vzhůru zpátky do podzemí
Welcome Back to the Dungeon
Zapraszamy ponownie do podziemi
Καλώς Ήλθατε και Πάλι στο Dungeon
boardgame.description: The sun is shining in the Abysmal Woods where you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;re strolling without a care in the world, your weapon at your belt, dreams of adventure in your head. On your path, you stop before a damaged dungeon door. It seems that great battles took place here, a sure sign of coveted treasure inside._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You recognize this dungeon from the ballads sung in your village! However, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;re not the only one who wants to enter, despite the warnings left around the entrance by the previous adventurers. Will you muster your courage to break open the door or will you let your opponents brave the monsters found inside? Let the adventure begin!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Welcome Back to the Dungeon is a simple and subtle push-your-luck game in which you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;ll need to adopt a show of bravado or outwit your opponents!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
